abstract: An article on Thursday about the falling share prices of the investment banks Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs misstated, in some editions, the market performance on Wednesday of shares in Wachovia, which is said to be considering a merger with Morgan Stanley. The shares fell 20.76 percent, or $2.39, not 2.39 percent.

lead_paragraph: An article on Thursday about the falling share prices of the investment banks Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs misstated, in some editions, the market performance on Wednesday of shares in Wachovia, which is said to be considering a merger with Morgan Stanley. The shares fell 20.76 percent, or $2.39, not 2.39 percent.
